title: После обновления Firefox невозможно использовать старый профиль
content: Я использую портативную версию Firefox. До последнего обновления всё работало хорошо. Но на этот раз я не могу использовать свой старый профиль на новом Firefox. Это делает Firefox для меня совершенно бесполезным. Я всё ещё надеюсь, что этот баг будет исправлен, и будет найден способ использовать старый профиль на новом Firefox.
creator: trizna1

title: Bing has invaded my Firefox on my desktop!!!
content: Starting a few days ago I noticed every time I open Firefox, it shows Google in the search bar, but whenever I search for something, it brings up Bing search instead. I have gone in an turned off Bing for search options and Google is the preferred search engine, but still does not work. I know I should be able to go in to Add-ons and delete anything with "bing" in the name along with other things, but whatever this is will not allow the Add-ons page open up. It is just a blank page. I have gone to the programs uninstall on the computer also and nothing I can see that shouldn't be there. I just want Google back and I am assuming that there was some auto update that happened and this tagged along because I haven't installed anything on here for a while. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: Shane.Hanson

title: "Some parts of this page are not secure" ... except everything is served over HTTPS
content:
Firefox shows this message: "Some parts of this page are not secure.."

Even on some pages where everything is secure!

For example, this image: https://www.parrotdomains.com/parrot_mascot.jpg

Chrome does not show any error or warning.

Do other people get the same issue?
creator: user3842394

title: Multiple audio sources to multiple hardware outputs, possible?
content: I noticed Windows 10 now has a feature under "App volume and device pref" that enables multiple audio sources to be channeled into multiple outputs(speakers, headphones etc) simultaneously. However, it only drills down to application level, and no further. So I'm wondering is it technically possible for each Firefox tab to be individually assigned to an audio output of the user's preference, maybe in a dropdown when right clicking the tab?
creator: chrishase

title: None of the webpages open
content:
My firefox is up to date. I have not added any new add-ons, and the ones I had before, I had no issues with. Recently when I open my firefox, none of the webpages open. I thought it was my connection but after trying a different browser, everything opens fine. I ran it in troubleshoot mode and the webpages open fine, but not when I go back to normal mode. I cleared out my cookie and cache, but that didn't resolve the issue.

Any ideas what is causing this?

title: "synced tabs" missing from my library
content:
Recently I went to open up a tab I had open on my iPhone on my macbook, but couldn't find the "synced tab" menu item under my library. I expected it to look like the example from https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/view-synced-tabs-other-devices, but instead I see what is shown in the attached image. I have already tried steps 1-6 of the "Troubleshoot and diagnose Firefox problems" help page (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-and-diagnose-firefox-problems)

Thanks in advance for any help!
